troubleshooting.title: Payment Intent creation fails
troubleshooting.shortdesc: Resolve errors when creating Payment Intent objects.

condition.title: Symptoms
condition.p: 400 Bad Request when creating Payment Intent.

cause.title: Possible Causes
cause.p: Payment Intent creation can fail due to incorrect parameter formatting or missing required fields.

step.cmd: Verify amount is a positive integer.
Check currency is a valid 3-letter ISO code.
step.info:
For example: usd, eur, jpy.
Failure due to missing required currency
